stimulusHtml: Using correct units, interpret the meaning of ∫ 0 2.4 v ( t )   d t MathType@MTEF@5@5@@441D@ in the context of the problem. Approximate ∫ 0 2.4 v ( t )   d t MathType@MTEF@5@5@@441D@  using a midpoint Riemann sum with three subintervals of equal length and values from the table.

features.html: Ruth rode her bicycle on a straight trail. She recorded her velocity v(t) , in miles per hour, for selected values of t over the interval 0≤t≤2.4 , as shown in the table above, For 0<t≤2.4,v(t)>0 .
